title: Survivor Kid: A Practical Guide to Wilderness Survival
description:
Survivor Kid: A Practical Guide to Wilderness Survival

2011 | ISBN: 1569767084 | English | 226 pages | EPUB 


Anyone can get lost while camping or on a hike and Survivor Kid teaches young adventurers the survival skills they need if they ever find themselves lost or in a dangerous situation in the wild. Written by a search and rescue professional and lifelong camper, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s filled with safe and practical advice on building shelters and fires, signaling for help, finding water and food, dealing with dangerous animals, learning how to navigate, and avoiding injuries in the wilderness. Ten projects include building a simple brush shelter, using a reflective surface to start a fire, testing your navigation skills with a treasure hunt, and casting animal tracks to improve your observation skills
